con:testSuite.name: Revenue Recognition part1

con:request.name: Create Revenue Recognition Script
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdateRevenueRecognitionScript>\r
         <!--Optional:-->\r
         <revenueRecognitionScript code="DAILY" description="DAILY">\r
            <type>JAVA</type>\r
            <script>
           <![CDATA[
package org.meveo.service.finance;

import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;
import java.util.List;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.model.billing.ChargeInstance;
import org.meveo.model.billing.WalletOperation;
import org.meveo.model.finance.RevenueSchedule;
import org.meveo.model.shared.DateUtils;
import org.meveo.service.script.revenue.RevenueRecognitionScript;

public class DailyRecognitionScript extends RevenueRecognitionScript {

	@Override
	public List<RevenueSchedule> scheduleRevenue(ChargeInstance chargeInstance,List<WalletOperation> woList, Date startDate, Date endDate,
			User currentUser) throws BusinessException {
		BigDecimal totalContractValue = BigDecimal.ZERO;
		for(WalletOperation wo:woList){
			totalContractValue.add(wo.getAmountWithoutTax());
		}
		double delay = DateUtils.daysBetween(startDate, endDate);
		BigDecimal dailyValue = totalContractValue.divide(new BigDecimal(delay));
		List<RevenueSchedule> result = new ArrayList<RevenueSchedule>();
		GregorianCalendar cal = new GregorianCalendar();
		cal.setTime(startDate);
		cal.set(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH,1);
		while (cal.getTime().before(endDate)){
			Date lastDate = cal.getTime();
			cal.add(Calendar.MONTH, 1);
			Date nextDate = cal.getTime();
			double nbDays= DateUtils.daysBetween(lastDate, nextDate);
			RevenueSchedule revenueSchedule = new RevenueSchedule();
			revenueSchedule.setRevenueDate(lastDate);
			revenueSchedule.setChargeInstance(chargeInstance);
			revenueSchedule.setRecognizedRevenue(dailyValue.multiply(new BigDecimal(nbDays)));
			result.add(revenueSchedule);
		}
		return result;
	}

}
    
            ]]>
            </script>\r
         </revenueRecognitionScript>\r
      </ws:createOrUpdateRevenueRecognitionScript>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: create script instance

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         	<createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.CounterPeriodScript_${#TestSuite#ticket}">
            <type>JAVA</type>
            <script>
            <![CDATA[
			package org.meveo.service.script;			
			import java.util.Map;
			import java.math.BigDecimal;
			import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
			import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
			import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
			import org.meveo.model.BusinessEntity;
			import org.slf4j.Logger;
			import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
			public class CounterPeriodScript_${#TestSuite#ticket} extends Script {
			  	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CounterPeriodScript_${#TestSuite#ticket}.class);
				public void execute(Map<String,Object> context, User user) throws BusinessException{
					log.debug("CounterPeriodScript_${#TestSuite#ticket} called");
				    }
			}
		   ]]>
            </script>
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createUsageChargeTemplate> <!--Optional:--> <usageChargeTemplate code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_USG1" description="${#TestSuite#ticket}_USG1" disabled="false"> <invoiceSubCategory>SUB_DATA</invoiceSubCategory> <!--Optional:--> <amountEditable>false</amountEditable> <priority>1</priority> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <languageDescriptions> <languageCode>FRA</languageCode> <description>Forfait test ${#ticket}</description> </languageDescriptions> <!--Optional:--> <inputUnitDescription>1</inputUnitDescription> <!--Optional:--> <ratingUnitDescription>Quantity</ratingUnitDescription> <!--Optional:--> <unitMultiplicator>2</unitMultiplicator> <unitNbDecimal>2</unitNbDecimal> </usageChargeTemplate> </ws:createUsageChargeTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create priceplan usage
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdatePricePlan> <pricePlan code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_PP_USG1" description="${#TestSuite#ticket}_PP_USG1"> <eventCode>${#TestSuite#ticket}_USG1</eventCode> <amountWithoutTax>10</amountWithoutTax> <amountWithTax>12</amountWithTax> <priority>1</priority> <customFields> <customField code="CF_STR"> <stringValue>STR value1</stringValue> </customField> <customField code="CF_DOUBLE"> <doubleValue>100</doubleValue> </customField> <customField code="CF_list_STR"> <listValue> <value> <stringValue>str1</stringValue> </value> </listValue> </customField> <customField code="CF_Map_STR"> <listValue> <value> <stringValue>str1</stringValue> <stringValue>str2</stringValue> </value> </listValue> <mapValue> <entry> <key>key1</key> <value> <stringValue>val1</stringValue> </value> </entry> <entry> <key>key2</key> <value> <stringValue>val2</stringValue> </value> </entry> </mapValue> </customField> </customFields>
</pricePlan> </ws:createOrUpdatePricePlan> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:testSuite.name: #1830 - [GUI-CF] CF matrix OFFER unsorted when clicking on the table heading

con:request.name: create PP CF4
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateCustomFieldTemplate> <customField code="${#TestSuite#ticket}_OfferMatrix" description="cf string matrix"> <fieldType>STRING</fieldType> <appliesTo>OfferTemplate</appliesTo> <storageType>MATRIX</storageType> <matrixColumns> <matrixColumn code="Matrix1" keyType="STRING" label="matrix key" position="1"/> </matrixColumns> </customField> </ws:createOrUpdateCustomFieldTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:testSuite.name: #1756 - Date format is wrong first time you apply a oneshot charge

con:request.name: Create service
con:request.con:request: MONTHLY ${#TestSuite#ticket}_OS1 PRINCIPAL

con:request.name: Create offer
con:request.con:request: false MONTHLY ${#TestSuite#ticket}_OS1

con:testStep.name: GUI-Adjustement
con:testStep.con:description: 1. Open the Meveo Admin page and log in. 2-Go to Configuration > Customers > Subscription > click on 1756_SUB > in 'On-shot charges' Tab click on apply a one-shot charge and add a new one OneShot the do 'Save' 3. Check if format date of 'Date operation' column is 'dd/MM/YYYY'
